newsitem.title: USA: U S West forms alliance to make chipcards.
newsitem.headline: U S West forms alliance to make chipcards.

text.p: U S West Communications Group said Wednesday it had formed an alliance with PTT Telecom Netherlands/Unisource, GTE Corp, Bell Canada and Telekom Malaysia Bhd to establish the Global Chipcard Alliance.
It said the goal of the alliance was to create an open infrastructure for chipcards to enable inter-operability on a world-wide basis and accelerate electronic commerce.
Major organizations like Oracle Corp have indicated their interest in joining the alliance, it added.
Under the alliance, U S West said it and the other companies would produce a limited edition four-card set that would be fully operational.
